name: One Shot (Minidevs)
description:
Once upon a time there was a tank. He used to have an automatic firing rifle.  all that is left is One Shot.. If only he could kill an Enemy in this shot would he get his bullet back, but this Old man still had some tricks up his sleeve .He could warp time and space (maybe not space , sounded cooler with the space). The army that would attack him would be humongous. He had to Fight them all.. With One Shot... 

Soundtrack Made By Cranberry Dolphin.

 Check him  out!: https://open.spotify.com/artist/6GLxBRUydDvwC3RalwyOnK

CONTROLS

W,A,S.D  - MOVE

MOUSE - AIM

LEFT MOUSE CLICK / X  - SHOOT

Z - TIME WARP WHEN THE BAR IS FULL
